content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is entirely in japanese but charted not only are these cute amigurumi - a bear and a cat - but they also functions as curtain ties no gauge is listed in the pattern calls for japanese size 7/0 4 0 mm hook **bear ** * color 1 approx 25 g 41 86 meters 45 78 yards * color 2 approx 6 g 10 05 meters 10 99 yards * color 3 approx 5 g 8 38 meters 9 16 yards **cat ** * color 1 approx 5 g 8 38 meters 9 16 yards * color 2 approx 5 g 8 38 meters 9 16 yards * color 3 approx 26 g 43 55 meters 47 63 yards note previously released as amikomo梅春-10 2 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/211s/211-25 pdf 2 http //www rakuten co jp/gosyo/461397/713923/852208/864100/
